events.title: Douglas Bader is shot down over France and captured

movie.title: Reach for the Sky
movie.plot: The true story of airman Douglas Bader who overcame the loss of both legs in a 1931 flying accident to become a successful fighter pilot and wing leader during World War II.
movie.awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 nominations.

movie.title: A Hidden Life
movie.plot: Austrian farmer Franz J채gerst채tter faces the threat of execution for refusing to fight for the Nazis during World War II.

events.title: Bert Bushnell and Dickie Burnell win the double sculls at the Olympics

movie.title: Bert & Dickie
movie.plot: Thrown together just five weeks before the final of the 1948 London Olympics, Bert Bushnell (Doctor Who's Matt Smith) and Dickie Burnell (Sam Hoare) defied all the odds and made history in the double sculls. This is the story of how they did it - not only by pushing physical and emotional limits, but also by overcoming their vast professional and personal differences.

movie.title: The Haunting of Sharon Tate
movie.plot: Pregnant with director Roman Polanski's child and awaiting his return from Europe, 26-year-old Hollywood actress Sharon Tate becomes plagued by visions of her imminent death.

events.title: Nicholas Markowitz, who Zack Mazursky is based on, is murdered

movie.title: Alpha Dog
movie.plot: Johnny Truelove likes to see himself as tough. He's the son of an underworld figure and a drug dealer. Johnny also likes to get tough when things don't go his way. When Jake Mazursky fails to pay up for Johnny, things get worse for the Mazursky family, as Johnny and his 'gang' kidnap Jake's 15 year old brother and holds him hostage. Problem now is what to do with 'stolen boy?'

movie.title: Paranormal Activity 2
movie.plot: Days after welcoming a newborn baby, Dan and Kristi Rey return home one day to find their house ransacked with seemingly no explanation. Their fear forces them to put in security cameras, which begin to capture strange activity around the house.

movie.title: District 9
movie.plot: Thirty years ago, aliens arrive on Earth. Not to conquer or give aid, but to find refuge from their dying planet. Separated from humans in a South African area called District 9, the aliens are managed by Multi-National United, which is unconcerned with the aliens' welfare but will do anything to master their advanced technology. When a company field agent contracts a mysterious virus that begins to alter his DNA, there is only one place he can hide: District 9.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 31 wins & 111 nominations.
